headline: 5 Revealing Analyst Questions From Stanley Black & Decker’s Q1 Earnings Call
summary: Stanley Black & Decker’s first quarter results for 2025 came in above Wall Street’s revenue and non-GAAP profit expectations, yet the market responded negatively. Management pointed to ongoing progress in its multi-year transformation, with CEO Donald Allan, Jr. noting improvement in organic growth and gross margins, particularly within the core Tools & Outdoor segment. However, the company faced continued pressure from weak DIY demand, freight inflation, and the early impact of new U.S. tariffs
